name: Quality Assessor • Precautions (Pharmacy)
description: Quality Assessor • Precautions (Pharmacy) summarizes trial registries and monitors allergies; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via Order Entry to improve safety signal sensitivity.

steps.name: Case Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize care plans from CPOE; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: Delegate
steps.description: Execute delegate phase for the Multi-Agent pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Handoff
steps.description: Execute handoff phase for the Multi-Agent pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Monitoring
steps.description: Monitoring across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Eligibility Match
steps.description: Eligibility Match across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Normalization
steps.description: Normalization across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Documentation
steps.description: Documentation across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Intervention
steps.description: Intervention across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Optimization
steps.description: Optimization across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Compliance Report
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to CPOE; return response JSON for the client.
